item.title: Prominent holocaust museum releases scathing response after Walz compares Minnesota children to Anne Frank
item.description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz faces backlash from Holocaust museum after comparing scared children to Anne Frank. Critics slam the comparison as offensive.
